item.title: GitHub升级后不再支持用户名密码鉴权
item.description: ⚠️ Support for password authentication was removed on August 13, 2021. Please use a personal access token instead. 登录 GitHub 打开 Settings 找到 Developer settings 找到 Personal access tokens 点击 Generate new token 配置 token 设置名字，设置过期时间，选择权限 (默认 repo 就可)，最后点击
